Title: How AI Companies Are Using AI
Description:
This episode explores a recent report on how AI companies themselves are utilizing AI. The discussion highlights key trends, including popular AI models, common deployment challenges like hallucinations, and the rapid rise of AI agents. It also examines prominent AI use cases delivering significant productivity gains—especially coding assistance—and discusses evolving business models and cost considerations as companies transition from experimentation to widespread implementation.

Report: https://www.iconiqcapital.com/growth/reports/2025-state-of-ai
